You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &otimes;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Otimes;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2a37/index.htm U+02A37].
  * `&otimes;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2297/index.htm U+02297].
